name: Rescue Team: Magnetic Storm
description:
In Rescue Team: Magnetic Storm, you find your world in danger once again, but this time by unprecedented natural disasters caused by intense solar activity. As you navigate through a city in chaos, you'll act as the guiding hand for a team of rescue workers tasked with restoring order and helping the people in need.



With each level presenting new challenges, you must repair electrical systems, rescue stranded or trapped people, and gather crucial resources while avoiding dangerous hazards such as electrified water and boiling lava. Along the way, you'll encounter panicked citizens suffering from a variety of health issues caused by the magnetic storms and encounter wild animals disoriented by the disturbances to their nervous systems.



As you progress through the levels, you'll work alongside Dr. Ross and his team of scientists to investigate the cause of the magnetic storms and find ways to protect the population from their harmful effects. With limited time and resources, you must make strategic decisions to prioritize your actions and help those in the greatest need.



Can you restore order to the city and help humanity weather the storm? Play Rescue Team: Magnetic Storm now and find out.



GAME FEATURES:
• 65 exciting levels
• Catchy downloadable soundtrack
• Dazzling desktop wallpapers
• Tutorial
• Step-by-step level guide
• Character biographies
• Sticker collection
